amendment.description: To express the sense of Congress regarding the reallocation of government spectrum.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3277 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3277 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Thune. (consideration: CR S7383-7385) To express the sense of Congress regarding the reallocation of government spectrum.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3277 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Thune.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3277 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
